General.Name: Gowa Makassar Tourism Develop
General.Description: PT Gowa Makassar Tourism Development Tbk engages in the real estate and urban development businesses in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Real Estate and Supporting. The company develops residential and commercial buildings, hotels, recreational facilities, and non-commercial supporting facilities; and constructs and develops planned areas, facilities, and infrastructure. It also provides ready-to-build land for consumers; and services related to township management, as well as manages built facilities and infrastructure. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Makassar, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Metro Tanjung Bunga, Makassar, Indonesia, 90134
